law.catch_line: Annual report of board to secretary.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 479, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 424, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 354, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (21). -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 16, effective June 13, 1968.
